title: UPDATES: Roglič Starts at Itzulia Basque Country, Kämna Recovering after being Struck by Vehicle
content:
Roglič rolls on, and Bora-Hansgrohe officials confirm Lennard Kämna is in 'stable condition' after being struck by a vehicle while training in Tenerife.

Read the full article at UPDATES: Roglič Starts at Itzulia Basque Country, Kämna Recovering after being Struck by Vehicle on Velo.
author: ahood
